Package DAO

Class AppointmentAccess

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentAccess
public class AppointmentAccess extends Object
Class which provides various means of access to Appointment class, such as retrieving appointment object lists, adding, deleting, and updating Appointment objects, looking up appointments, and converting data from database into Appointment object.

      Returns filteredAppointments ObservableList.

    • initializeAppointments

      public static void initializeAppointments()
      Method that initializes Appointment objects via appointments table in database.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Method that adds Appointment object to allAppointments list
      Parameters:
      appointment - Appointment object to be added.

    • removeAppointment

      public static boolean removeAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Method that removes Appointment object to allAppointments list
      Returns:
      Returns true if Appointment object was successfully removed, otherwise false.

    • getApptObjFromDB

      public static Appointment getApptObjFromDB(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Method that takes appointment information from database and returns a new Appointment object based on said data.
      Parameters:
      rs - ResultSet used to query database for appointment data to use.
      Returns:
      Returns newly created Appointment object.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(int id, Appointment updatedAppointment)
      Method that updates Appointment object in allAppointments list.
      Parameters:
      id - Appointment ID to determine Appointment object's index position in list.
      updatedAppointment - Updated Appointment object.

    • lookupIndex

      public static int lookupIndex(int appointmentId)
      Method that searches for allAppointments list index given an appointment ID and returns index.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment ID to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns index of Appointment object in list; returns -1 if not found.

    • lookupAppointment

      public static Appointment lookupAppointment(int appointmentId)
      Method that searches allAppointments list using appointment ID and returns Appointment object.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment ID to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns Appointment object; returns null if not found.

    • lookupAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> lookupAppointments(String userText)
      Method that searches allAppointments list via user text input and returns list of Appointment objects whose name contains user text.
      Parameters:
      userText - User text to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns list of Appointment objects whose name contains user's text input.

    • executeAdd

      public static void executeAdd(String title, String description, String location, int contactId, String type, ZonedDateTime startZDT, ZonedDateTime endZDT, String createdBy, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId) throws SQLException
      Method that contains main logic behind adding Appointment objects and data to database.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of newly created appointment and database insert.
      description - Description of newly created appointment and database insert.
      location - Location of newly created appointment and database insert.
      contactId - Corresponding contact ID of newly created appointment and database insert.
      type - Type of newly created appointment and database insert.
      startZDT - Start ZonedDateTime object of newly created appointment and database insert.
      endZDT - End ZonedDateTime object of newly created appointment and database insert.
      createdBy - User who created this appointment object.
      lastUpdatedBy - User who created this appointment object.
      customerId - Associated customer ID of newly created appointment and database insert.
      userId - Associated user ID of newly created appointment and database insert.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • executeDelete

      public static void executeDelete(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Method that contains main logic behind deleting Appointment objects and data from database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment ID to determine appointment data to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • checkUpcomingAppointment

      public static Appointment checkUpcomingAppointment(User user)
      Method that determines if user has any appointments within 15 minutes.
      Parameters:
      user - User object against whose appointment times upcoming appointments are compared.
      Returns:
      Returns Appointment object if one exists within 15 minutes of now, otherwise returns null.
